question: Between whom the Battle of Plassey was fought?
option3: Saddit Ali Khan and Murshid Quli Khan
explanation: The Battle of Plassey (1757) was fought between Nawab of Bengal, Siraj-ud-Daulah and British army led by Robert Clive. Due to conspiracy, Nawab of Bengal Siraj-ud-Daulah was defeated by the British army. This event marked the \'drain of wealth\' from India to British.
